page.title: 03Eling Village & Eling Mill
page.content:
{Leisure}: A yacht club & a boat moorings along the busy Wharf / Mill area. Picnic / barbecue and estuary walks along GOATEE BEACH.
{Estuary}: Tidal, serves wharf & Goatee Beach areas and is fed by the River Test a world famous chalk river & Southampton Water.
{Conclusions}: Interviews have indicated that most people enjoy living in the area. The Tide Mill has been restored & is now working. Goatee Farm has been purchased by local authority for leisure facilities. Some fears have been expressed over pollution especially from nearby Fawley Refinery & chemical burning works.
